about.smallDesc: Hey! I'm No√©, a fullstack developer ‚Äî but that's not all! I'm passionate about photography, music, and sports. Feel free to scroll down to learn more about me! üëá
about.resume: I'm a curious and creative fullstack developer with a strong technical background and a genuine passion for visuals, music, and interactive experiences. After a year-long road trip through New Zealand and several years working in a web agency, I'm open to new projects, whether freelance or collaborative. Feel free to reach out if you'd like to build something together.

part1.title: Hey there! I'm No√©
part1.text: I just got back from a one-year van road trip across New Zealand! A unique break where I stepped away from development to slow down, explore, meet people, and reconnect with nature. It was also a great opportunity to improve my English (it needed some work, let's be honest) and dive into photography. Over there, it's almost too easy ‚Äî the landscapes are stunning at every turn.

part2.title: From Math Teacher to Developer
part2.text: Before heading to New Zealand, I was studying for a Master's degree in Digital Project Management in Rennes, through a work-study program. I specialized in fullstack development and gained hands-on experience across the entire web production pipeline. Originally, I wanted to become a math teacher. I loved the logic, structure, and elegance of mathematics, but I was looking for something more tangible. Coding became the perfect balance between technical skills, logic, and creativity.

part3.title: 3 Years at Bob le D√©veloppeur
part3.text: My professional journey took shape at Bob le D√©veloppeur, a web agency based in Paris, where I spent three years as a work-study developer. I worked on a variety of projects using stacks like Next.js and Nest.js, explored many different libraries, communicated with clients, and managed projects from start to finish. It was an incredibly valuable experience within a close-knit team.

part4.title: What Drives Me Outside of Code
part4.text: Outside of development, I'm deeply passionate about music and photography. I love composing, playing in bands, exploring sound, and capturing moments through a lens. To me, these creative disciplines blend perfectly with coding ‚Äî they all require precision, attention to detail, and imagination. And after hours spent in front of a screen, swimming and climbing are my go-to activities to stay balanced and energized.
